title: IThreadFeatureData.Revolutions
description: Gets or sets the number of revolutions in the helix of this thread feature, taking into account any offset.
returns: 0.0 < Number of revolutions in the thread helix; default is 10.0 (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IThreadFeatureData::EndCondition
is set to
swThreadEndCondition_e
.swThreadEndCondition_Revolutions.
Specify either a value or an equation that starts with an equal sign (=).
